about_the_game:
We're happy to bring you 'Wizard of Wings' demo, the improved mobile port of the final chapter of the popular game 'The Birdcage.' Step into a world of beautiful graphics and clever puzzles. The demo includes a total of 4 levels from three different worlds, offering a delightful and varied experience. Enjoy well-crafted details and stunning visuals that create an engaging journey. Get ready for a rewarding and memorable room escape adventure.

Warning: This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.
detailed_description:
We're happy to bring you 'Wizard of Wings' demo, the improved mobile port of the final chapter of the popular game 'The Birdcage.' Step into a world of beautiful graphics and clever puzzles. The demo includes a total of 4 levels from three different worlds, offering a delightful and varied experience. Enjoy well-crafted details and stunning visuals that create an engaging journey. Get ready for a rewarding and memorable room escape adventure.

Warning: This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.
name: Wizard of Wings: Escape Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 or newer 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A puzzle-adventure room escape game demo. Solve clever puzzles set within stunning 3D graphics, exploring well-crafted environments to uncover hidden clues and useful objects. Experience the thrill of freeing the birds and advancing through this mesmerizing journey.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
